[00:00.00]Talk - Khalid/Disclosure
[00:09.20]Lyrics by：Khalid Robinson/Howard Lawrence/Guy Lawrence
[00:18.41]Composed by：Khalid Robinson/Howard Lawrence/Guy Lawrence
[00:27.62]Can't we just talk
[00:30.32]Can't we just talk
[00:32.10]Talk about where we're goin'
[00:34.73]Before we get lost let me out first
[00:38.88]Can't get what we want without knowin'
[00:41.70]I've never felt like this before
[00:44.85]I apologize if I'm movin' too far
[00:48.83]Can't we just talk
[00:51.48]Can't we just talk
[00:53.23]Figure out where we're goin'
[00:56.29]Yeah started off right
[00:59.85]I can see it in your eyes
[01:01.60]I can tell that you're wantin' more
[01:05.56]What's been on your mind
[01:06.94]There's no reason we should hide
[01:08.66]Tell me somethin' I ain't heard before
[01:12.12]Oh I've been dreamin' 'bout it
[01:16.64]And it's you I'm on
[01:19.93]So stop thinkin' 'bout it
[01:24.13]Can't we just talk
[01:26.73]Can't we just talk
[01:28.47]Talk about where we're goin'
[01:31.16]Before we get lost let me out first
[01:34.97]Yeah
[01:35.38]Can't get what we want without knowin'
[01:37.53]No
[01:38.07]I've never felt like this before
[01:41.51]I apologize if I'm movin' too far
[01:45.33]Can't we just talk
[01:47.84]Can't we just talk
[01:49.62]Figure out where we're goin'
[01:52.91]Oh nah
[01:55.01]Penthouse view left some flowers in the room
[01:58.07]I'll make sure I leave the door unlocked
[02:02.04]Now I'm on the way swear I won't be late
[02:05.37]I'll be there by five o'clock
[02:08.49]Oh you've been dreamin' 'bout it
[02:13.03]And I'm what you want
[02:16.42]So stop thinkin' 'bout it
[02:20.60]Can't we just talk
[02:22.35]Oh can't we just talk
[02:24.92]Talk about where we're goin'
[02:27.63]Before we get lost let me out first
[02:31.80]Can't get what we want without knowin'
[02:34.61]I've never felt like this before
[02:38.01]I apologize if I'm movin' too far
[02:41.75]Can't we just talk
[02:44.34]Can't we just talk
[02:46.11]Figure out where we're goin'
[03:00.35]Figure out where we're goin'
data.trans:
[ti:Talk]
[ar:Khalid/Disclosure]
[al:Talk]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:09.20]//
[00:18.41]//
[00:27.62]我们能聊聊吗
[00:30.32]我们能聊聊吗
[00:32.10]聊聊我们的现状
[00:34.73]在我们迷失之前 先让我解脱
[00:38.88]再这样迷茫下去 不可能得偿所愿
[00:41.70]我以前从未有过这种感觉
[00:44.85]如果是我太心急 那我道歉
[00:48.83]我们能聊聊吗
[00:51.48]我们能聊聊吗
[00:53.23]明确我们的共同目标
[00:56.29]一开始我们是对的
[00:59.85]从你的眼神中我能明白
[01:01.60]我知道你想要更多
[01:05.56]你到底在想什么
[01:06.94]我们不该隐瞒什么
[01:08.66]跟我说说你一直隐瞒的事情吧
[01:12.12]我一直期待这一刻到来
[01:16.64]我的枕边人是你
[01:19.93]所以 别再胡思乱想了
[01:24.13]我们能聊聊吗
[01:26.73]我们能聊聊吗
[01:28.47]聊聊我们的现状
[01:31.16]在我们迷失之前 先让我解脱
[01:34.97]//
[01:35.38]再这样迷茫下去 不可能得偿所愿
[01:37.53]不会
[01:38.07]我以前从未有过这种感觉
[01:41.51]如果是我太心急 那我道歉
[01:45.33]我们能聊聊吗
[01:47.84]我们能聊聊吗
[01:49.62]明确我们的共同目标
[01:52.91]//
[01:55.01]阁楼风景独好 在房间里放一些花
[01:58.07]我得确保门没有锁
[02:02.04]我现在已经出门了 我不会迟到
[02:05.37]五点以前我肯定能赶到
[02:08.49]你一直在期待着这一刻
[02:13.03]我就是你渴望的那个人
[02:16.42]所以 别再胡思乱想了
[02:20.60]我们能聊聊吗
[02:22.35]我们能聊聊吗
[02:24.92]聊聊我们的现状
[02:27.63]在我们迷失之前 先让我解脱
[02:31.80]再这样迷茫下去 不可能得偿所愿
[02:34.61]我以前从未有过这种感觉
[02:38.01]如果是我太心急 那我道歉
[02:41.75]我们能聊聊吗
[02:44.34]我们能聊聊吗
[02:46.11]明确我们的共同目标
[03:00.35]明确我们的共同目标
